job.title: Software Engineer (Entry level)
job.description: ltpgtClient is a team of software architecture specialists bilingual in business and technology who set the standard for architecture excellence in the insurance and healthcare industries Careers with the client offer rapid growth constant learning and the immediate chance to make an impact From day one here youll be working sidebyside with our senior architects contributing to highimpact projects and meeting with our clients face toface Its a true meritocracy  fueled by a diversity of backgrounds cultures and experiencesltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspGet involved in all phases of a project from discovery and planning through implementation  and deliveryltpgtltpgtampnbspParticipate in architecture definition product selection and application designltpgtltpgtampnbspDesign and develop core business applications for insurance healthcare and other industriesltpgtltpgtampnbspWear many hats and gain experience with tools technologies and platforms across many technology stacksltpgtltpgtampnbspWork closely with Senior Developers and ArchitectsltpgtltpgtampnbspLearn new things and grow rapidly from constant exposure to innovative ideas concepts and patternsltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtQUALIFICATIONSltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtampnbspDesign and develop business applications and integration solutions using JavaJ2EE NET and JavascriptltpgtltpgtampnbspDegree in Computer Science or equivalent is preferredltpgtltpgtampnbspKnowledge of design patterns and the ability to apply themltpgtltpgtampnbspStrong problem solving skillsltpgtltpgtampnbspAbility to conceptualize and articulate ideas clearly and conciselyltpgtltpgtampnbspExcellent communication and interpersonal skillsltpgtltpgtampnbspWillingness to travel on an occasional basis as local and possibly outofstate travel is requiredltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtOUR PHILOSOPHIESltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtampnbspAgile approach  emphasis on good people continuous delivery of value close collaboration with clientsltpgtltpgtampnbspLearning and reuse by leveraging patterns and frameworksltpgtltpgtampnbspSmall teams focused on full lifecycle from discovery and planning through implementation and launchltpgtltpgtampnbspNo technology bias and no affiliations with vendors  we use the technologies and approaches that make sense for our clientsltpgtltpgtampnbspConstant learning  adding modern technologies frameworks tools and products to our tool beltltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggt WORK ENVIRONMENT AND CULTUREltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtampnbspBe surrounded by smart talented people with shared values of continually challenging investing in and stretching themselves to new levelsltpgtltpgtampnbspCollaborate with seasoned architects to solve problems and to challenge assumptionsltpgtltpgtampnbspWork in small teams with opportunities for rapid growth and accelerated responsibilities driven purely by individual performanceltpgtltpgtampnbspSmall company  open environment flat organization casual attire flexibility and no hierarchical structuresltpgtltpgtampnbspEveryone has a voice and is always encouraged to engage in shaping the company by sharing their interests ideas and feedbackltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtBENEFITS AND PERKSltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtWhen it comes to our benefits and perks we have everything youd expect from health insurance retirementltpgtltpgtbenefits and so on But like our name even our benefits exceed expectationsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspHealth Vision Dental Life Disabilityltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbsp401k with employer matchltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspAnnual raises and promotions based on individual performanceltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspPrograms Professional Development Wellness Professional Dress allowanceltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspDiscretionary Points and Travel Points redeemable for cash or additional time offltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspCompany sponsored social events for employees and familiesltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspWorkLife Balance flexible hours vacation days unlimited sick days personal days holidaysltpgt
